title: Overall [0–4]
stimulusHtml:
Score Scale 0–4

4 Correctly identifies the artist as Hogarth. Analyzes how the artist used satire to comment on class and taste in the society of his time. Analysis is full and without significant errors.

3 Correctly identifies the artist as Hogarth. Analyzes how the artist used satire to comment on class and taste in the society of his time. Analysis is not as full and may contain minor errors.

OR

Does not correctly identify the artist as Hogarth but is otherwise a 4.

2 Correctly identifies the artist as Hogarth. Discusses how the artist used satire to comment on class and taste in the society of his time, but the answer lacks specificity and may contain errors.

OR

Does not identify the artist as Hogarth but is otherwise a 3.

1 Correctly identifies the artist but includes no other discussion of merit.

OR

Does not identify the artist as Hogarth but is otherwise a 2.

0 Makes an attempt, but the response is without merit because it fails to identify the artist or makes only incorrect or irrelevant statements.
